description:
Adachi spends her school days skipping class until she meets fellow delinquent Shimamura and the two become fast friends. Cutting class together deepens their friendship but soon unexpected emotions blossom.

As awkwardness and confusion settle in, the two girls travel this sea of emotions without a paddle as they learn about each other’s feelings.

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Table Tennis
tags.description: Centers around the sport of table tennis (also known as "ping pong").

tags.name: Fishing
tags.description: Centers around the sport of fishing.

title.native: 安達としまむら ミニアニメ

node.description:
__Doujin circle:__ hey you!, Mogetama (もげたま)

[Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/16385479) | [Tumblr](https://mogetama.tumblr.com) | [Website](https://www.coco-leka.com/about)

Goes by the pen name __Non__ (のん) for manga and light novel illustrations and uses __Yokota Tanakamori__ (田中森よこた) for BL work.
He is a member of Writers Guild of Japan.

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/miku/index.html) | [Profile (Columbia)](https://columbia.jp/itomiku/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/itou-miku/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/InfoItomiku) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/itomiku_official/) | [LINE](https://page.line.me/itomiku_official) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miku_Itō) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/伊藤美来)

Miku joined the idol unit [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177) on April 27, 2013 and is one half of its subunit, [Pyxis](https://anilist.co/staff/139753), along with [Moe Toyota](https://anilist.co/staff/118398). 

Miku's hobbies include watching anime, dancing, and playing Hyakunin Isshu. She also practices kendo (but is at the lowest level) and enjoys acting. She is a fan of Kamen Rider, and her favorite rider is Den-O.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Fu Xuan - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
• Olivia - Memento Mori (VG)
• Kolulu - Granblue Fantasy (VG)
• Indomitable - Azur Lane (VG)
• Liv - Punishing: Gray Raven (VG)
• Agnès Claudel - Kiseki Series (VG)

__Height:__ 153 cm
__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r09-kitou.html
) | [Official Site](https://kitoakari.com/) | [Twitter (Official)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_1016/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU_E2DHcyQu-Toohyd1vzRw)

A Japanese voice actress. She debuted in 2014, got her first main role in *Time Bokan 24* (2016), and has since received more leading roles. On October 16, 2019, her 25th birthday, she made her debut as a solo music artist under Pony Canyon. After the agency Pro-Fit shut down their operations, she joined the new agency Racoon Dog on 2022. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Abukuma](https://anilist.co/character/228251/Abukuma), Hass, Isuzu, and Nagara - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Barbara](https://anilist.co/character/203315/Barbara-Pegg) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Silence](https://anilist.co/character/186429/Silence) - Arknights (VG)
- Rola - Shadowverse (VG)
- Sabrina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Ashley Graham - Resident Evil 4 Remake (VG)
- Pepper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Celine](https://anilist.co/character/305904 ) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.
